file_content.text: Sergeant Bedareux here. The outer guard station's nearby; if you can take control, I can get you more intel.
We have control of the guard station, but there's heavy opposition. Recommendations?
Biggest problem is the force fields. Archon's got his manor sealed tight inside those things.
Apologies! I am continuing efforts to keep all tremors in check. Unfortunately, half the planet's mesas are on the verge of collapsing.
Right.
Anyway, there are laser turrets all around the compound. Turn them on the manor, might be enough firepower to down the force fields.
Stay in communication. The force fields will be down shortly.
I'll head to the turrets.
Yes, my lord.
Yes, sir.
Nadrin? How difficult would it be to collapse the manor with a groundquake?
Let the quakes bury the place.
Without collapsing everything else in a hundred-kilometer radius? Extremely difficult.
And we'd be short on leads if it turned out our hostages weren't in there.
This way, we can interrogate the Archon ourselves if we have to. Once the force fields are down, should be a straight line to him.
And if it's not enough firepower? What then?
You don't sound certain.
Sorry, my lord. I'll work on a backup plan, but I wouldn't suggest the turrets if they didn't seem the best bet.
Sorry, sir. Doing my best, but I've only got so much data to work from. I'll keep at it.
Once you're inside, it'll be a straight line to the Archon--and with a bit of luck, the people he took. Let's hope they're alive.
